name: Filesticks USBentures
description:
you are filesticks, a robot that likes a LOT usb drives but one day someone robbed them. can you help filesticks to recover the USB's?

This game was made for the #LinuxGameJam2022 using the Godot engine

The source code will be avalible soon

controls:

  • use the arrow keys or WASD to move around
  • you can fly using the SPACE key
